CustomField.formula: IF( OR(SBQQ__ProductName__c = "License for Vehicle Gateways - Public Sector", SBQQ__ProductName__c = "License for Vehicle Gateways"), "VG-34 Bundle - Public Sector", SBQQ__ProductName__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use: To display certain products as a bundle on quote documents
CustomField.label: Bundle SKU Name
